name: renegcl

stmt.origin: dedth(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wcel(cneg(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))), cr))
stmt.pretty: dedth(c0, nat1, c0 ∈ ℝ, -u(c0)∈ ℝ, -u(if(c0 ∈ ℝ, c0, 1))∈ ℝ)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))
-| wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))), wb(wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wcel(cneg(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))), cr)))
-| wcel(cneg(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))), cr)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))
-| wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))), wb(wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wcel(cneg(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))), cr)))
-| wcel(cneg(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))), cr)

stmt.origin: eleq1d(cneg(c0), cr, cneg(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))), wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))))
stmt.pretty: eleq1d(-u(c0), cr, -u(if(c0 ∈ ℝ, c0, 1)), c0 = if(c0 ∈ ℝ, c0, 1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))), wb(wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wcel(cneg(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))), cr)))
-| wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))), wceq(cneg(c0), cneg(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))
-| wcel(cneg(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))), cr)
-| wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))), wceq(cneg(c0), cneg(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr)))))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))), wceq(cneg(c0), cneg(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))
-| wcel(cneg(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr))), cr)

body.origin:

-| wcel(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr)), cr)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))
-| wcel(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr)), cr)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cif(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cr)), cr)
-| wcel(nat1, cr)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))
-| wcel(nat1, cr)

comment: Closure law for negative of reals. The weak deduction theorem ~ dedth is used to convert hypothesis of the inference (deduction) form of this theorem, ~ renegcli , to an antecedent. (Contributed by NM, 20-Jan-1997.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
